entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who zoomed away backwards with his tongue out at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story.

entities.name: justin
entities.description: Justin was carried up to the hospital wing by Professor Flitwick and Professor Sinistra.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a professor who helped carry Justin to the hospital wing.

entities.name: professor sinistra
entities.description: Professor Sinistra is a professor from the Astronomy department who helped carry Justin to the hospital wing.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick was being fanned up the stairs by Ernie.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie was given a fan by Professor McGonagall to waft Nearly Headless Nick up the stairs.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a professor who gave Ernie a fan and led Harry around a corner.

entities.name: sherbet lemon
entities.description: Sherbet lemon was the password to unlock the gargoyle.

entities.name: gargoyle
entities.description: The gargoyle sprang to life and hopped aside when Professor McGonagall said 'sherbet lemon'.

relationships.description: Peeves zoomed away backwards with his tongue out at Harry.
Justin was carried up to the hospital wing by Professor Flitwick and Professor Sinistra.
Ernie was given a fan by Professor McGonagall to waft Nearly Headless Nick up the stairs.
Professor McGonagall led Harry around a corner.
Sherbet lemon was the password to unlock the gargoyle.
